name: Pen's Panic LD49
description:
An emotionally unstable Walrus has come to feed on the flightless angels of the equally unstable artic, it is up to Pendleton to save as many as he can before the fiend brings his blubbery army to feast!

Move: WASD

Camera: MOUSE

Toggle Slide (on land): LMB

Jump (in water): LMB

Gather (while standing): HOLD RMB and rapidly tap WASD

Recover (while knocked): Rapidly tap WASD

Animation, Art, and Programming by TomatoLamp
Music by Taylor Cook

Made for Ludum Dare 49 https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/pens-panic-ld49
